mapper.sql: from_id, to_id, content, has_read, conversation_id, created_date
mapper.select: /*先查出每个分组有几条记录 再内连去重*/ select m1.from_id, m1.to_id, m1.content, m1.has_read, m1.conversation_id, m1.created_date, (select count(*) from message m2 where m2.conversation_id = m1.conversation_id ) as msgNumbers from message m1 join ( select conversation_id, max(created_date) as created_date from message group by conversation_id) m3 on m3.conversation_id = m1.conversation_id where m1.created_date = m3.created_date and (from_id = #{userId} or to_id = #{userId}) order by m1.created_date desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
